node

Class SiteImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • node.SiteImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, SiteItf

    public class SiteImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements SiteItf
    Class which describe an UnicastRemoteObject, There is a main for the SiteImpl object creation.
    Author:
    florian Malapel & Antonin Noel
    See Also:
